xs.description: Extra small FX duration for subtle, quick animations

sm.description: Small FX duration for fast micro-interactions

md.description: Medium FX duration for standard animations (default)

lg.description: Large FX duration for prominent animations

xl.description: Extra large FX duration for dramatic effects

bounce.description: Bounce easing with overshoot for playful effects. Avoid for position-based animations that must stay within bounds (e.g., slides, transforms to exact positions).

spring-sm.description: Small spring easing with subtle bounce (~50% overshoot). Avoid for position-based animations that must stay within bounds (e.g., slides, transforms to exact positions).

spring-md.description: Medium spring easing with moderate bounce (~80% overshoot). Avoid for position-based animations that must stay within bounds (e.g., slides, transforms to exact positions).

spring-lg.description: Large spring easing with dramatic bounce (~150% overshoot). Avoid for position-based animations that must stay within bounds (e.g., slides, transforms to exact positions).
